good/very/very much

sentences.english: Laughter is powerful medicine, so laugh often.
sentences.chinese: 笑声是最好的良药，所以要经常笑。

sentences.english: Tofu is as good as medicine for lowing cholesterol
sentences.chinese: 豆腐是一种类似低胆固醇的良药。

sentences.english: You are the one that I can laugh when I dream of you.
sentences.chinese: 你是我治愈我心疾的良药，梦见你时我都会笑。

sentences.english: It was awful tasting medicine, but I guess the patient needed it.
sentences.chinese: 良药苦口利于病，但是我想病人需要这个药。

sentences.english: And perhaps that's the best medicine you can give somebody.
sentences.chinese: 也许这才是你能给这个人最好的良药。

sentences.english: And their respect and praise gives you the ideal dose of self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 他们对你的欣赏和赞许是使你获得自信的一剂良药。

sentences.english: Laughter is the best medicine, indeed.
sentences.chinese: 大笑确实是最好的良药。

sentences.english: Book is medicine of the breaking heart.
sentences.chinese: 书是医治心灵创伤的良药。

sentences.english: Finds laughter is the best medicine.
sentences.chinese: 笑口常开是无上的良药。

sentences.english: Thus the drug may be a requisite cold drug in a household.
sentences.chinese: 本药是家庭必备的治感冒良药。

sentences.english: Work is the grand cure of all the maladies and miseries that ever beset mankind.
sentences.chinese: 工作是医治人间一切病痛和疾苦的万应良药。

sentences.english: This medicine will clear up your cold.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种治感冒的良药。

sentences.english: I have suggested palliatives for the change-pressed individual.
sentences.chinese: 我为深受变化重压之苦的个人提供几剂良药。

sentences.english: But is there an antidote to anxiety?
sentences.chinese: 但是我们有没有对付焦虑的良药呢？

sentences.english: Good medicine is bitter in the mouth.
